replies.body:
Huh, you’re actually the first person I’ve seen who came to complain about a ban on the boards while **not** delusionally toxic.

Best I got is submit a ticket
well ty just mad the person that was toxic that game didnt get banned

This is extremely common and ridiculous. The ACTUAL toxic players get banned far less often than the types of people who just respond a couple of times. This system is dumb and shouldn't be there. Riot should just globally censor the words they are so terrified of and be done with it.

That said, Riot Support won't look at the context and will uphold their decision and say you should never type naughty words in chat no,matter what the context or intent is.
Im so done with league, First I get muted now banned idek anymore the kid repeatedly called me a homophobic phrase and me replying to it gets me banned
